body: Hi Boris and group members, Thanks a lot for so great component, Boris.  I got a small problem by making a closed volume, which you can see below. I checked the envelope there was no error, but when to use the BBX to check the intersective boundary line, there was a gap.  So, could you please help me out ? Thank you in advance.
